resources.string: Give us a cup of Tea ;)
The 205 Trophée is a humanitarian car raid, created and implemented by the agency ProRaids Organization, and specifically dedicated to the legendary Peugeot 205.

It is not a race but a real test of orientation without any notion of competition. It is a great human and sporting challenge that allows participants to satiate their thirst for open spaces, to go to the end of themselves, to discover Morocco differently and to meet its nice populations.
The event is entirely based on mutual aid and conviviality.

Find the spirit of the pioneers, return to the sources of adventure-travel, rediscover the joys of the stage and taste the charm of stellar bivouacs. Maintain the myth of Peugeot in Africa and continue its exploits, defying every year its sacred number. Provide material support to small Moroccan associations with high needs. To overcome the difficulties related to the irregularities of the ground and to cross the finish line, thanks to the solidarity.
205 en ROOT is an association law 1901 with humanitarian and sporting vocation, created on October 21st, 2017
The office of the association is composed of 2 members: \n\t- President : Clément FOYART \n\t- Treasurer : Mathias HANNA

In 2019, our association aims for: \n \t- Participate in the 12th edition of the 205 TROPHEE humanitarian raid in April 2019 in Morocco \n \t- Collect material and send it to Morocco for distribution to the association concerned
This adventure will allow us to provide help to people in need, often faced with difficult living conditions. Indeed, the 205 Trophée entretiencet engagement each year with Moroccan associations.

These actions most often consist in transporting various materials to these associations such as: 
	- Books and school supplies 
	- Clothes 
	- Medical equipment (Wheelchairs, crutches ... ) 
	- Digital equipment (Computers, screens, printers, tablets ...) 
	- And many others ...
